{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMCITG100 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=03/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf=AWB |manuf_model=WRM6202-1U-QIS-17 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router, wireless internet appliance |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 MiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=touchscreen,3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=smcadmin |oui=00:22:2D |oui_eth=00:22:2D }} ''Infotainment Router''
[http://www.smc-asia.com/products03.php?Fullkey=219 Product page (SMC Asia)] :[http://www.smc-asia.com/tw/files/SMCITG100%20(UG)%20R01_final.pdf Manual] Per the manual... *The title for the manual notes the device as '''WRM6202-1U-17''', which would seem to be the board P/N / manuf. model **Googlery for this P/N yields [http://www.ebay.com/itm/NEW-WP3800K-WRM6202-1U-QIS-17-BOARD-MODULE-/120793080509 this '''eBay''' listing] ***full P/N of WRM6202-1U-QIS-17, "P/N: 142000000018A REV: 01" is silkscreened on the board ('''Accton''' / '''Arcadyan''' / etc P/N, rolling the dice and going with '''AWB''' for this one), alt. P/N of WP3800K? ***RT3050 based (w/ U.FL connector), 16 MB (W9812G6IH-6) RAM, *In router mode... **The default SSID is '''SMC'''. WEP is enabled by default - the password is '''smcadmin'''. **The default IP is 192.168.2.1. *In bridge mode... **The default IP is 192.168.2.250. *In AP Client mode... **The default IP is 192.168.2.250.
